did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Kheel Center Collection of Oral Histories, 1965-1975
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: This collection is made up of oral history interviews from the NLRB (National Labor Relations Board), UTU (United Transportation Union), and others.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives.
Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives --Archives
United States. National Labor Relations Board--Archives

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Kheel Center Collection of Oral Histories #6058 OH. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.
